author: PlayStation
description:
https://www.playstation.com/games/pacific-drive/

Hit the wide open Zone in the largest update to Pacific Drive yet!

Set off from the garage on new continuous drives - Expeditions. Dangerous and filled with their own unique rewards, these challenging trips will test even the most seasoned breacher. New maps, spawning systems, improved tools and so much more is coming April 3rd, 2025.

We've also created a new Suspend Run feature, something that's been requested heavily by the community! Suspend and quit while on a trip mid-junction and return any time without losing any progress.

There's also new cosmetic rewards for your garage, over an hour of new music on the radio, and even more lore to discover through the fax machine, Truly, this is our biggest and best update yet.

Pacific Drive: Endless Expeditions Releases on April 3rd, 2025.

#ps5 #ps5games #pacificdrive
title: Pacific Drive - Endless Expeditions Spring 2025 Update | PS5 Games

description:

Turn your hand to palaeontology in the latest No Man's Sky update, RELICS! Unearth hundreds of unique bones, assemble skeletons to design fossil exhibits, join the community on an expedition to recreate lost creatures, battle against gargantuan stone guardians, and more!

#ps5 #ps5games #ps4 #ps4games #psvr2 #psvr2games #psvr #psvrgames #nomanssky

The next-generation racing AI agent, Gran Turismo Sophy has evolved into “GT Sophy 2.1” and is now available in ‘Custom Race’ (PS5 version only) 

Update 1.57* for Gran Turismo 7 available as of Wednesday, March 26 at 10:00pm PT / March 27 at 5:00am GMT / 2:00pm JST.  

*Internet connection and Gran Turismo 7 game required for update.

author: PlayStation
description:
Buy Now: https://store.playstation.com/en-us/product/UP2514-PPSA18027_00-PLANETZOOOAEBUND


Introducing the Planet Zoo: Oceania & Eurasia bundle! Prepare to set sail and explore breathtaking archipelagos and experience the beauty and culture of the continent's sun-kissed Pacific islands, or wrap up warm and explore the heart of Eurasia as you immerse yourself in vast landscapes and untamed beauty!
  
•        THIRTEEN OCEANIA & EURASIA ANIMALS
•        200+ BOLD SCENERY PIECES
•        TWO COMPELLING NEW CAMPAIGN SCENARIOS

Planet Zoo © 2025 Frontier Developments plc. All rights reserved.

title: Planet Zoo: Console Edition - Oceania & Eurasia Bundle Launch Trailer | PS5 Games
